arcane_general.name: Arcane Magic
arcane_general.description: General purpose scholarly magic, foundational for Mages and Wizards.

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.description: Spells of deception, phantasms, and visual/auditory trickery.

enchantment.name: Enchantment
enchantment.description: Magic focused on charming, mental control, and buffing/debuffing allies/enemies.

conjuration.name: Conjuration
conjuration.description: Bringing objects or non-living energy into existence (e.g., snowballs, magical walls).

summoning.name: Summoning
summoning.description: Calling forth living creatures or powerful entities to aid in battle.

necromancy.name: Necromancy
necromancy.description: Magic dealing with death, undeath, and life drain.

geomancy.name: Geomancy
geomancy.description: Harnessing the raw, elemental power of the earth and stone.

chronomancy.name: Chronomancy
chronomancy.description: Manipulation of time, speed, and aging effects.

elemental_fire.name: Elemental Fire
elemental_fire.description: Offensive and utility spells based on fire.

elemental_water.name: Elemental Water/Ice
elemental_water.description: Offensive and utility spells based on water and ice.

elemental_air.name: Elemental Air/Poison
elemental_air.description: Spells based on wind, lightning, and airborne toxins.

elemental_light.name: Elemental Light
elemental_light.description: Spells based on radiant energy and illumination.

dark_magic.name: Dark Magic
dark_magic.description: Forbidden arcane arts often associated with Warlocks and Anti-Paladins.

divine_general.name: Divine Magic
divine_general.description: Traditional magic of the Priesthood, focused on healing, protection, and smiting.

nature_general.name: Nature Magic
nature_general.description: The wild, unpredictable magic of Druids and the untamed world.

holy_light.name: Holy Light
holy_light.description: Pure protective and offensive holy power.

unholy_dark.name: Unholy Dark Magic
unholy_dark.description: The corrupted equivalent of Divine Magic (used by Anti-Paladin).

mental_psionic.name: Mental/Psionic
mental_psionic.description: Magic derived from mental discipline and pure willpower (Psionics).

voodoo_ritualistic.name: Voodoo/Ritualistic
voodoo_ritualistic.description: Tribal magic focused on curses, hexes, and powerful, preparation-heavy rituals (Witch Doctor).

shamanism.name: Shamanism
shamanism.description: Calling upon elemental and ancestral spirits for aid (Shaman).
